fehd.ADR_EN: (GRILL ROOM & FUNCTION ROOM), INTERCONTINENTAL GRAND STANFORD HONG KONG, 70 MODY ROAD, TSIM SHA TSUI EAST, KOWLOON
fehd.ADR_TC: 九龍尖沙咀東麼地道70號 海景嘉福酒店 1樓扒房及宴會室

geocode_en.formatted_address: No. 70, Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: No. 70, Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: No. 70, Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong
result.name: InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong

reviews.text:
Located on the Victoria Harbour in Tsim Sha Tsui you will find an amazing hotel that is simply one of the best in Hong Kong. The Grand Stamford Intercontinental Hotel is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a luxury hotel in Hong Kong.  The service in the hotel is second to none. The staff cannot do any more to make you stay enjoyable and a shear delight. The rooms are spacious and decorated in a modern style but still in line with the Intercontinental style you would expect.

The club lounge is an amazing retreat and the staff in there looked after us from start to end. Breakfast is available from early in the morning with both western and Asian delights. Afternoon tea is served from 3pm and then cocktails and snacks available from 6pn until 8.30.

The staffs are polite, professional and helpful. The area is situated in a good location, near cafe's and restaurants. The hotel interior is a bit old but very well kept and clean. The room is comfortable and the hotel has some class pubs and restaurants. The rooftop pool is smaller that I expected. Overall, will definitely recommend and stay here next time.

After having the opportunity to stay here, I finally understand why people spend so much money to stay at a five-star hotel. The facilities were beautiful, the amenities were good, and the service was sublime. I was not impressed with the food we received for room service, but the concierge and convenience of the location made up for it. I would stay at this hotel again.

Celebrate my son's birthday there, that place is awesome. Full Harbour view suite. Nice friendly staff Kenneth and Andrea, quiet and comfortable lounge. Fully equip gym. Will def stay again in near future.

Stayed here twice, but the last time was with my family during the holidays. This hotel is along the bay, and has one of the best views. The staff here are polite, fast, and helped us make our stay very comfortable. Breakfast is also amazing. There is a complimentary shuttle service to and from the Airport Express Kowloon Station if you are staying at this hotel.

result.adr_address: 香港尖東麼地道 No. 70
result.name: 海景嘉福洲際酒店

reviews.text: 沒有海景的海景軒😬👍🏿‼️

인터콘티낸탈 그랜드 스텐포드 호텔
가격은 좀 있지만 깔끔하게 유지되고있고 직원분들도 친절하다.
가든뷰를선택하면 가든은 볼수없고 벽만 보인다  높은을 요구하니 청소가 덜되었다며 2시간 기다리라고하더니 높은층에 벽보이는방을 배정해 주었다. 야경보고 싶어서 높은층 달라고한것인데. 
전체적으로 다시 가고싶지는 않은 호텔이다.

Located on the Victoria Harbour in Tsim Sha Tsui you will find an amazing hotel that is simply one of the best in Hong Kong. The Grand Stamford Intercontinental Hotel is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a luxury hotel in Hong Kong.  The service in the hotel is second to none. The staff cannot do any more to make you stay enjoyable and a shear delight. The rooms are spacious and decorated in a modern style but still in line with the Intercontinental style you would expect.

The club lounge is an amazing retreat and the staff in there looked after us from start to end. Breakfast is available from early in the morning with both western and Asian delights. Afternoon tea is served from 3pm and then cocktails and snacks available from 6pn until 8.30.
飯店舒適，人員親切，維房間格局較小點，稍舊些，飯店臨海港，晚上夜景很漂亮，離尖東地鐵站須稍微步行約十幾來分鐘的。不過飯店附近餐廳很多也很熱鬧。

The staffs are polite, professional and helpful. The area is situated in a good location, near cafe's and restaurants. The hotel interior is a bit old but very well kept and clean. The room is comfortable and the hotel has some class pubs and restaurants. The rooftop pool is smaller that I expected. Overall, will definitely recommend and stay here next time.

result.adr_address: 70 Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 70 Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong
result.name: InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong - Academy Rooms

reviews.text: Wonderful hotel, every time I stay here, including this stay. The lounge staff is on top of their game, as always.  Can't wait til my next stay here!

Stayed 2 nights in July 2018..Very good location..No complimentary breakfast.. Very cheerful helpful staff..Well furnished spacious rooms...
We checked out by noon but the hotel was courteous to let us use bathroom/ shower late afternoon, before leaving for evening flight.
Food and service is excellent !
Very nice hotel. The staff was so helpful so we we felt like we were at home. Really comfortable rooms.
A luxury hotel

result.vicinity: 70 Mody Road, Tsim Sha Tsui East

result.name: 海景嘉福酒店宴會廳

reviews.text: Wonderful hotel, every time I stay here, including this stay. The lounge staff is on top of their game, as always.  Can't wait til my next stay here!
インターナショナルグランドスタンフォードホテルです。ここは場所も抜群だし、室内も綺麗で広くてバッチリです。ホテルの人も親切で居心地いいホテルですよ！

Stayed 2 nights in July 2018..Very good location..No complimentary breakfast.. Very cheerful helpful staff..Well furnished spacious rooms...
We checked out by noon but the hotel was courteous to let us use bathroom/ shower late afternoon, before leaving for evening flight.
Food and service is excellent !
チェックアウトがすんなりいけて、ほぼキーを返すだけだった。チェックインは暑い中なかなか進まず長かった。日本語は通じず。英語オンリー
